docs.snippet: WRITING of a country without dogmatic intention, setting down at random the fleeting impressions of a tour, offers this advantage, that it permits one to fix on the canvas some aspects of life which are open to various interpretations, and thus...
docs.lead_paragraph: WRITING of a country without dogmatic intention, setting down at random the fleeting impressions of a tour, offers this advantage, that it permits one to fix on the canvas some aspects of life which are open to various interpretations, and thus demand the constant collaboration of writer and reader.

headline.main: THE WORKINGS OF THE ARGENTINE GOVERNMENT; Former Premier Clemenceau of France Gives His Impressions of the Organization of the Public Administration.

docs.snippet: PITTSBURG, March 19. -- Buyers of steel have taken the Steel Corporation at its word in the matter of prices. The evident conservatism of the leading interest, in its guarantee not to permit reckless price advances in finished steel prices has been...
docs.lead_paragraph: PITTSBURG, March 19. -- Buyers of steel have taken the Steel Corporation at its word in the matter of prices. The evident conservatism of the leading interest, in its guarantee not to permit reckless price advances in finished steel prices has been to some extent responsible for steadying the rush of forward buying that set in late in January.
docs.abstract: US Steel Corp action to prevent reckless price rises in finished steel halts buyers rush

headline.main: U.S. STEEL POLICY STOPS BUYERS' RUSH; Forward Ordering Slows Down When Price Raising Is Banned.

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO at first sight had given me so favorable an impression that I was anxious not to lose the opportunity of seeing more of it. But I had begun with the Argentine, and in such a country the more you see the more you want to see. I tore myself...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO at first sight had given me so favorable an impression that I was anxious not to lose the opportunity of seeing more of it. But I had begun with the Argentine, and in such a country the more you see the more you want to see. I tore myself away from it with great regret, conscious that I was leaving much undone.

headline.main: URUGUAY, SPOILED CHILD OF THE SOUTHERN FAMILY; Clemenceau Says the Argentines So Regard Her -- A Land Where the Principles of the Revolution Have Been Carried Further Than in France.

docs.snippet: NEW HAVEN, Conn., April 22. -- Two exceptional performances featured the Yale Spring track meet this afternoon, the 12 feet 4 inch pole vault of Robert Gardner and the furlong hurdle race of George Chisholm, who won the event in 25 3-5 seconds....
docs.lead_paragraph: NEW HAVEN, Conn., April 22. -- Two exceptional performances featured the Yale Spring track meet this afternoon, the 12 feet 4 inch pole vault of Robert Gardner and the furlong hurdle race of George Chisholm, who won the event in 25 3-5 seconds. Gardner is the former golf champion.

headline.main: TWO STAR YALE ATHLETES.; Gardner Vaults 12 Feet 4 Inches -- Chisholm Runs 220 Hurdle Race in 0:25 3-5.

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 15. -- With every nation on earth represented for the first time since its establishment in 1883, the International Union for the Protection of Industrial Property began its fourth conference here to-day to consider many new...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 15. -- With every nation on earth represented for the first time since its establishment in 1883, the International Union for the Protection of Industrial Property began its fourth conference here to-day to consider many new industrial problems, which have arisen either directly or indirectly from patent and trade-mark laws.

headline.main: CONFER ON INDUSTRIES.; All Nations Send Delegates to Congress on Industrial Property.

docs.snippet: IN a comparative study of the culture of the different nations of the world Mark Jefferson has arrived at some remarkable conclusions. They are all based on statistics, and the figures are verifiable.
docs.lead_paragraph: IN a comparative study of the culture of the different nations of the world Mark Jefferson has arrived at some remarkable conclusions. They are all based on statistics, and the figures are verifiable.

docs.snippet: NEXT to my own countrymen, the Italians -- and one must, of course, give first place to his own countrymen -- the Americans, I think, are the most universally accomplished of the races and the most surprisingly absurd. Next to my own countrymen you...
docs.lead_paragraph: NEXT to my own countrymen, the Italians -- and one must, of course, give first place to his own countrymen -- the Americans, I think, are the most universally accomplished of the races and the most surprisingly absurd. Next to my own countrymen you are the most universally capable of becoming good fighters both on sea and land: next to my own countrymen you have the finest sense of independence.

headline.main: GRANDSON OF THE GREAT GARIBALDI FIGHTS IN MEXICO; A Talk With the Picturesque Italian Soldier of Fortune Who is Training Himself Under Madero to be a Fighting Man -- His Mysterious Ambition.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 27. -- Crop prospects in most foreign countries are fairly satisfactory. The Department of Agriculture so describes the situation. Partial failure of the corn crop in Arigentina and Uruguay and the backward season in almost all Europe...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 27. -- Crop prospects in most foreign countries are fairly satisfactory. The Department of Agriculture so describes the situation. Partial failure of the corn crop in Arigentina and Uruguay and the backward season in almost all Europe are the only untoward conditions.

headline.main: WORLD CROPS NOT TOO GOOD.; Some Failures in Corn -- Argentina Wheat Yield Likely to be Big.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 7. -- The Consular and Trade Report will note the following foreign trade opportunities. Further information regarding these may be obtained by addressing the Bureau of Manufactures, care of the Department of Commerce and Labor, Washington, D.C., giving the number of item referred to:
